notes: o Aliquot and store at -20 °C • APS solution (10% in Milli-Q water) o Aliquot and store at -20 °C • Monomer solution (sodium acrylate 19% wt/wt, acrylamide 10% v/v, BIS 0.1% v/v, in PBS) o WARNING: Monomer solution should be prepared and used in the fume hood. o o WARNING: SDS stock solution should be prepared in the fume hood due to the toxicity of powdered SDS. • NaCl stock solution (5 M) • Denaturation buffer (200 mM SDS, 200 mM NaCl, 50 mM Tris, pH 9, in water)
caption: Monomer solution MUST be prepared at least 24 hours in advance and can be stored at -20 °C for up to 2 weeks.

rows.content: o We typically make 900 µL of monomer solution as follows, and store as 10 x 90 µL aliquots
• SDS stock solution (350 mM in Milli-Q water)
• Sodium acrylate solution (38% wt/wt in Milli-Q water)
o WARNING: sodium acrylate solution should be prepared and used in the fume hood due
to the toxicity of powdered sodium acrylate.
